info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 2 at 12:59PM CDT by NWS Memphis TN
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi...
Coldwater River near Sarah
For the Coldwater River...including Sarah...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Coldwater River near Sarah.
* WHEN...From late Thursday night until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Flooding is occurring on the left bank. Mainly agricultural land is flooded. The levee system protects the right bank from flooding.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early Friday morning to 18.5 feet early Friday afternoon and eventually to 22.5 feet Sunday evening. Pay close attention to subsequent forecasts as multiple days of rain will impact the crest and duration of the flooding. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis.
The next statement will be issued as needed.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
